question: The UNESCO World Heritage Site "Holasovice Historic Village" is located in which country?
explanation: Holasovice Historic Village, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is located in the Czech Republic. It is an exceptionally complete and well-preserved example of a traditional central European village. It has a large number of outstanding 18th and 19th-century vernacular buildings in a style known as "South Bohemian folk Baroque'. It is located in the South Bohemian Region of the Czech Republic.
